content.en: Reference gene stability: Scientists have conducted research to identify the most stable reference genes for normalizing gene expression in various plant species under different conditions. They used algorithms such as geNorm, NormFinder, and BestKeeper to determine the suitability of reference genes. This information is crucial for accurate gene expression analysis and understanding how plants respond to different stressors.
content.da: Referencegenstabilitet: Forskere har udført forskning for at identificere de mest stabile referencegener til normalisering af genudtryk i forskellige plantearter under forskellige forhold. De brugte algoritmer som geNorm, NormFinder og BestKeeper til at bestemme egnetheden af referencegener. Disse oplysninger er afgørende for nøjagtig genudtryksanalyse og forståelse af, hvordan planter reagerer på forskellige stressfaktorer.
